metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12428 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-1, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadWMFImage in coders/wmf.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service in CloneDrawInfo in draw.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0078-wmf-file-memory-leak-in-CloneDrawInfo.patch in unstable 0078-wmf-file-memory-leak-in-CloneDrawInfo.patch in stretch 0264-CVE-2017-12428-Fix-denial-of-service-memory-leak-in-ReadWMFImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
